5200.name: The Grand Gate Of Thalos
5200.description:
The area opens in the archway of a gigantic stone archway. The two steel
gates have been forced open and have rusted in place. A hollow gust of
wind blows by you into the deserted, and seemingly destroyed, city. The
cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet. Buildings crowd together
on all sides.

east.description: The desert sands stretch on for miles and miles.

west.description: You see devastation everywhere.  Houses lie in ruin and skeletons litter the streets.  You see strange beasts stalking the shadows.

5201.name: Main Street
5201.description:
This was once a magnificent street, but now is in total ruin. The
streets are barren and windswept and the silence is unending. To the
south you see a ruined cottage while north leads into a dark back alley.
Howls and screams echo through the deserted city. Vendors and
pedestrians bustle past. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the
air.

north.description: It seems to be a dark alley.

east.description: The entrance to the city lies this way.

south.description: A ruined shack lies to the south.

west.description: Main Street lies this way.

5202.name: Main Street
5202.description:
This was once a magnificent street, but now is in total ruin. The
streets are barren and windswept and the silence is unending. On one
side is a collapsed house while on the other is the entrance to a large
ruined mansion. Eerie sounds echo within the mansion. Near the center of
town you see a large domed building, relatively intact. The sounds of
city life echo around. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the
air.

north.description: The remnants of a store lie this way.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to Main Street

south.description: It looks like what used to be the main building in the city.

west.description: A withered garden path lies this way.

5203.name: A Garden Path
5203.description:
A circular path surrounds a magnificent domed temple in the center of
the city. Flowers have withered away and the once lush trees are bare.
Vines and ivy snake up the sides of the temple and entangle themselves
around your feet. A sudden volley of howls pierces the air. The smell of
smoke and humanity hangs in the air. The sounds of city life echo around
you.

north.description: The garden path continues around the building.

east.description: This is the main street leading to the city's entrance.

south.description: The garden path continues around the building.

west.description: Inside the temple, small patches of light shoot through each doorway as well as a few holes in the ceiling.

5204.name: A Garden Path
5204.description:
A circular path surrounds a magnificent domed temple in the center of
the city. Flowers have withered away and the once lush trees are bare.
Vines and ivy snake up the sides of the temple and entangle themselves
around your feet. The sounds of city life echo around. The smell of
smoke and humanity hangs in the air.

north.description: A side street leads of to the northern half of the city.

east.description: The garden path continues around the building.

south.description: Inside the temple, small patches of light shoot through each doorway as well as a few holes in the ceiling.

west.description: The garden path continues around the building.

5205.name: A Garden Path
5205.description:
A circular path surrounds a magnificent domed temple in the center of
the city. Flowers have withered away and the once lush trees are bare.
Vines and ivy creep up the sides of the temple and entangle themselves
around your feet. Buildings crowd together on all sides. The
cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet.

north.description: The garden path continues around the building.

east.description: Inside the temple, small patches of light shoot through each doorway as well as a few cracks in the ceiling.

south.description: The garden path continues around the building.

west.description: What looks like a market place lies this way.

5206.name: A Garden Path
5206.description:
A circular path surrounds a magnificent domed temple in the center of
the city. Flowers have withered away and the once lush trees are bare.
Vines and ivy creep up the sides of the temple and entangle themselves
around your feet. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet.
Buildings crowd together on all sides.

north.description: Inside the temple, small patches of light shoot through each doorway as well as a few cracks in the ceiling.

east.description: The garden path continues around the building.

south.description: A small side street leads to the southern half of the city.

west.description: The garden path continues around the building.

5207.name: The Market Place
5207.description:
The area opens in the middle of a large square lined on each side with
baskets, carts, and stands of all shapes and sizes. Abandoned, these
little shops still contain some of their goods once sold to a demanding
public. The sounds of city life echo around. The smell of smoke and
humanity hangs in the air.

north.description: A small table has been toppled over, spilling fine jewellery and gems onto the ground.

east.description: A small garden path encircles a large domed temple in the center of the  city.

south.description: Rotted remains of fruits and vegetables lie strewn about.

west.description: The market place continues.

5208.name: The Market Place
5208.description:
The area opens at the end of the market square. Stands and carts line
each side, filled with remnants of fine foods and exquisite goods.
Vendors and pedestrians bustle past. The smell of smoke and humanity
hangs in the air.

north.description: Tattered carpets and ruined bales of silk sit idly by a run down stand.

east.description: The center of the market lies this way.

south.description: From the massive stench, this must have been a meat and poultry stand. It lies totally bare.

5209.name: A Side Street
5209.description:
This small side street leads east and west into back alleys while to the
south you see the temple. The incessant howling tears at your mind. The
sounds of city life echo around. Vendors and pedestrians bustle
past.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to A Back Alley

south.description: The cobblestones lead to A Side Street

west.description: The cobblestones lead to A Back Alley

5210.name: A Side Street
5210.description:
This is the common section of the city. Ruined buildings made of clay
and stone is all the view has to offer. Most of these homes are nothing
but piles of rubble, but some look almost safe enough to venture into.
The street continues north and south and buildings line the street. The
cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet. The smell of smoke and
humanity hangs in the air.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to A Side Street

east.description: A small doorway leads into a partially collapsed house.

south.description: The cobblestones lead to A Side Street

west.description: A small clay dwelling sits here.

5211.name: A Side Street
5211.description:
This small side street leads away from the garden path to the south.
around stand large piles or rubble where the houses of commoners
used to be. A lone howl makes you worry greatly about your safety here.
The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet. The smell of smoke
and humanity hangs in the air.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to A Side Street

east.description: An unusually tall dwelling stands looming over you.

south.description: A garden path circles around the temple.

west.description: Here lies a small stone house with a thatched roof.

5212.name: A Side Street
5212.description:
This small side street leads south away from the temple into the
business section of town. The destruction that leveled this city was not
biased; these important looking buildings have been almost totally
destroyed. There is a hole in the wall of a very large structure to the
east. The sounds of city life echo around. Vendors and pedestrians
bustle past.

north.description: A small garden path encircles the temple.

east.description: This possibly could be the city hall.

south.description: The cobblestones lead to A Side Street

west.description: Inside the building you see long pieces of metal, an oven, and some anvils.

5213.name: A Side Street
5213.description:
This small side street is lined with the remains of once great
buildings. To the west is a dark, foreboding structure while to the east
lies the entrance to a small tavern. The street continues north and
south. Buildings crowd together on all sides. The cobblestones are worn
smooth by countless feet.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to A Side Street

east.description: From the looks of it, this was once a two story abode.  The entire second floor has collapsed leaving a very little part of the bar still free from debris.

south.description: The cobblestones lead to A Side Street

west.description: This seems to be the only guild house in the entire city.  Its dark nature makes you wonder about its origins.

5214.name: A Side Street
5214.description:
This is the end of a long street leading to the center of the city. A
long dark alley runs east and west. The sounds of city life echo around
you. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to A Side Street

east.description: The cobblestones lead to An Abandoned Shop

west.description: The cobblestones lead to A Back Alley

5215.name: Under A Ruined Watchtower
5215.description:
The area opens at the base of a tall watchtower built to protect the
city from invaders. From the looks of things, it did not do a good job.
The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet. The sounds of city
life echo around.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to A Back Alley

east.description: The cobblestones lead to A Back Alley

up.description: The cobblestones lead to The South-West Watchtower

5216.name: A Back Alley
5216.description:
This alley leads to the rear of what used to be a meat stand. You wince
at the stench. South is one of the city watchtowers. Vendors and
pedestrians bustle past. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the
air.

north.description: You see the back-side of the market place meat stand.

south.description: A tall watchtower stands a silent vigil over the city.

5217.name: The Meat Stand
5217.description:
A large stand has been set up here with metal hooks and wooden racks in
the background. Hanging on the hooks are very small scraps of meat and
other game. This stand is relatively empty, and a sudden burst of
howling and screaming makes you realize why this is so. Buildings crowd
together on all sides. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless
feet.

north.description: The market place lies this way.

east.description: This is a cart full of rotted vegetables and fruits.

south.description: The cobblestones lead to A Back Alley

5218.name: A Back Alley
5218.description:
A narrow alley leads east to a wider street and west to one of the city
watchtowers. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air. The
sounds of city life echo around.

east.description: A small side street greets you.

west.description: A tall watchtower stands a silent vigil over the city.

5219.name: The Guild House
5219.description:
This is what once was this city's ONLY guild house. Tables and chairs
have been smashed and broken weapons lie strewn about the floor as if
some massive battle had taken place here. Draped along the back wall is
a tattered, jet-black banner with the symbol of the Darkside set upon
it. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past. The smell of smoke and humanity
hangs in the air.

east.description: A small side street runs past the building.

5220.name: The Produce Stand
5220.description:
A large cart sits here carrying rotted fruit and vegetables. Flies swarm
all about what seems to be the last remaining bits of food left in the
city. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past. The cobblestones are worn
smooth by countless feet.

north.description: The market place is deserted.

west.description: A strong stench emanates from the meat stand next to you.

5221.name: The Smithy
5221.description:
In here you find tools and anvils used to make various weapons and
items. The walls have been stripped clean and only a few incomplete
pieces of armor and weaponry are left. The sounds of city life echo
around. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet.

east.description: A small side street runs past the building.

5222.name: The Tapestry Stand
5222.description:
Tattered and torn tapestries and rugs lie heaped in piles. Fancy robes
and various articles of clothing are now just rags. You stare at the
strange piles for a long time until a piercing howl makes you think
these might be beds. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet.
Vendors and pedestrians bustle past.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to A Back Alley

east.description: A fine jewellery stand lies in ruin next to you.

south.description: The market place is deserted.

5223.name: A Back Alley
5223.description:
A narrow alley leads north to one of the city watchtowers while to the
south there lies a market stand full of torn clothes and rugs. Vendors
and pedestrians bustle past. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in
the air.

north.description: A tall watchtower stands a silent vigil over the city.

south.description: The cobblestones lead to The Tapestry Stand

5224.name: Under The Watchtower
5224.description:
The area opens under one of the city watchtowers built to protect the
city from invaders. Obviously, it failed. Vendors and pedestrians bustle
past. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to A Back Alley

south.description: The cobblestones lead to A Back Alley

up.description: Above you looms a tall watchtower.

5225.name: The Jewellery Stand
5225.description:
A table has been tipped over, spilling fine jewellery and gems across
the market place. Most of these trinkets are battered and tarnished and
few would have any value anymore. The cobblestones are worn smooth by
countless feet. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past.

south.description: The market place is deserted.

west.description: Next to you is a stand full of ruined clothes and rugs.

5226.name: A Ruined Clay Dwelling
5226.description:
This was once a very plain house with nothing more than a few chairs and
a bed. A cold fireplace suggests that the city has been abandoned for
quite a while. Almost nothing remains of this humble abode. The
cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet. Vendors and pedestrians
bustle past.

east.description: Outside is a small side street.

5227.name: A Collapsed Stone Dwelling
5227.description:
This small house has completely collapsed upon itself leaving piles of
debris here and there. A few rafters still stand with thatched straw
hanging down and a hot wind gusts through the hollow dwelling. The
sounds of city life echo around. The smell of smoke and humanity
hangs in the air.

east.description: A small side street runs past the house.

5228.name: A Back Alley
5228.description:
A narrow alley leads west to one of the city watchtowers and east to a
small side street. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air.
Buildings crowd together on all sides.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to A Side Street

west.description: The cobblestones lead to Under The Watchtower

5229.name: An Abandoned Shop
5229.description:
From the outside this place looks like an ordinary pile of rubble, but
inside these cramped quarters you discover what used to be a shop filled
with armor, weapons, and various other goods. A small sign flutters in
the wind. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air. The
cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet.

west.description: A small side street runs past the shop.

5230.name: The Tavern Of The Sun
5230.description:
A glorious place in its prime, this tavern now lies in ruin; tables and
chairs are broken scattered, bottles and glasses shattered, and a small
performance stage crushed. Musical instruments and personal belongings
lie under the rubble, but the people they once belonged to are not with
them. Looking up you see that the entire second floor and roof has
fallen in, leaving a gaping hole above. The smell of smoke and humanity
hangs in the air. The sounds of city life echo around.

west.description: A small side street runs past the tavern.

5231.name: The South Wing Of The City Hall
5231.description:
The area opens in a large room attached to this end of the hallway which
leads back north to the reception area. Pedestals and columns have
fallen and most of the valuable items have been taken, leaving worthless
debris. A few chairs have survived, as well as a large curved desk. To
the east is a vine-covered archway leading out into a private courtyard.
Buildings crowd together on all sides. The sounds of city life echo
around.

north.description: The long hallway leads back to the main reception area of the city hall.

east.description: The Private Gardens And Courtyard Of Thalos

5232.name: The City Hall
5232.description:
This is the main reception area of Thalos' city hall. The walls have
been charred and scored massively and debris is spread from wall to
wall. A large gaping hole in the west wall allows you to see out to one
of the city's side streets. Obviously no one will be seeing you through
today. Hallways lead south and east. Buildings crowd together on all
sides. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet.

north.description: Main street runs past the city hall.

east.description: A hallway leads to the east wing of the city hall.

south.description: A hallway leads to the south wing of the city hall.

west.description: The cobblestones lead to A Side Street

5234.name: The Private Gardens And Courtyard Of Thalos
5234.description:
What a shame that this mass destruction also touched this once beautiful
place. The temple's garden path has nothing on this garden. Flowers and
trees have been smashed into the ground and lawn benches thrown through
walls. A large marble fountain in the center of the courtyard still
stands, though, defying any attempts to destroy its beauty. Above stands
the remnants of one of the watchtowers. Archways north and west lead
back into the city hall. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the
air. The sounds of city life echo around.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to The City Hall Foyer

west.description: The cobblestones lead to The South Wing Of The City Hall

5235.name: A Small Guard House
5235.description:
This was once the barracks for Thalos' Cityguards. Now just an empty
shell, this small shack still stands guarding the entrance both to the
city and to the city hall. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the
air. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet.

north.description: Main street runs by this building.

5236.name: A Collapsed Home
5236.description:
All that's left of this house is a few scattered piles of rubble and a
very large blast crater. Obviously someone or something important was
once housed here. A shrieking howl chills your blood. The smell of smoke
and humanity hangs in the air. The cobblestones are worn smooth by
countless feet.

south.description: Main street runs past this ruined home.

5237.name: A Tall Dwelling
5237.description:
This seems to be the tallest structure remaining in the city. At one
time this could have been an inn of some sort, but now it is just a
mess. The back wall as been completely knocked down revealing an
entrance into another building through yet another collapsed wall.
Between the two buildings are a few blast craters and boulders. An old
set of wooden steps leads up to a creaking second floor. The
cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet. Buildings crowd together
on all sides.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to A Small Shack

west.description: A small side street winds past the dwelling.

up.description: The stairs and even the entire second floor itself looks very unsafe for travel.  Gusts of wind make them creak and shudder.

5238.name: A Small Shack
5238.description:
This cramped dwelling could not have housed more than one person. Now
with the back wall missing, it could hold many more. Looking around
find broken shelves and workbenches with various vials and pouches
spilling contents all across the floor. This was possibly the magic shop
of the city. The doorway to the east is blocked, making the only exit
back west. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past. The cobblestones are
worn smooth by countless feet.

west.description: The cobblestones lead to A Tall Dwelling

5239.name: A Back Alley
5239.description:
A narrow back alley goes south to main street and north towards a
watchtower. A mass of howls catches you of guard. The smell of smoke and
humanity hangs in the air. The sounds of city life echo around.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to A Back Alley

south.description: Main street runs past here.

5240.name: A Back Alley
5240.description:
A narrow back alley leads north to one of the city watchtowers and south
towards main street. To the west is a doorway to a small house blocked
by debris. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet. Buildings
crowd together on all sides.

north.description: A tall watchtower stands a silent vigil over the city.

south.description: The cobblestones lead to A Back Alley

5241.name: Under A Watchtower
5241.description:
The area opens under a tall watchtower. Narrow back alleys lead west and
south and a very weak looking ladder leads up into the tower. above, you
hear the screams of tens of starving lamias! Beware! The smell of smoke
and humanity hangs in the air. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past.

south.description: The cobblestones lead to A Back Alley

west.description: The cobblestones lead to A Back Alley

up.description: Winds howl high above your head in the tower above.  You hear the screams of tens of howling lamias above you!

5242.name: A Bath House
5242.description:
This was once the bath house for the commoners of the city. Hot steamy
water still wells up from a hole in the floor. Obviously there is a hot
spring located under the city (making the decision to put a city here
seem much more reasonable). Closer inspection of the water yields a dead
body floating around in it, skin melted away from months of floating in
there. The west wall has collapsed revealing another collapsed house.
The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet. Buildings crowd
together on all sides.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to A Back Alley

west.description: The wall has collapsed on the adjoining house, creating a new opening in it.

5243.name: A Back Alley
5243.description:
A narrow back alley leads west to a small side street and east to one of
the city watchtowers. Great amounts of steam issue forth from the
building to the south. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless
feet. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air.

east.description: A watchtower stands a silent vigil over the city.

south.description: The cobblestones lead to A Bath House

west.description: A side street runs by here.

5244.name: An Upright House
5244.description:
This home is practically the only one around that is still standing.
Except for the massive hole in the east wall, everything else looks
intact, including the windows. Great amounts of steam issue forth from
the hole in the east wall. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past.
Buildings crowd together on all sides.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to A Bath House

west.description: A small side street runs past the house.

5245.name: On The Second Floor
5245.description:
The minute you step off onto this floor you realize it was a mistake.
The old rotted floorboards suddenly give way and you fall down, impaling
yourself on jagged boards below. Buildings crowd together on all sides.
The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet.

5246.name: The North-West Watchtower
5246.description:
The area opens atop one of the city watchtowers. The view is magnificent
from here and Visible is all the way to the western mountains. No wonder
this place stood for so long. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in
the air. The sounds of city life echo around.

5247.name: The South-West Watchtower
5247.description:
The area opens atop one of the city watchtowers. The view is magnificent
from here and Visible is all the way to the western mountains. To the
south the desert stretches to the horizon. No wonder this place stood
for so long. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet. The
smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air.

5248.name: The North-East Watchtower
5248.description:
The area opens atop one of the city watchtowers. The view is magnificent
from here and you the desert sand stretches to the horizon. No wonder
this place stood for so long. The ladder leading down seems rotted in
some places! The sounds of city life echo around. The cobblestones are
worn smooth by countless feet.

down.description: The city lies below... far, far below.

5249.name: Under A Watchtower
5249.description:
As you descend the ladder, the rotted rungs break, sending you quickly
to your demise far below on the city street. Splat. The smell of smoke
and humanity hangs in the air. The cobblestones are worn smooth by
countless feet.

5250.name: The Temple Of Thalos
5250.description:
The area opens within one of the most holy places in the realm. This
stunning domed temple once housed the city's worshipers en masse.
Unfortunately, it succumbed to the destruction brought on this city.
Long benches lie toppled and the altar desecrated. Large chunks of stone
have fallen from the walls and roof, sending sunlight streaming in on
you. A few books lie about, conveying to you a holy message in a strange
tongue. Wind gusts through the four archways and howls and screams can
be heard from all parts of the city. The sounds of city life echo
around. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air.

north.description: A side street leads to the northern half of the city.

east.description: Main street leads out to the main gate of the city.

south.description: A side street leads to the southern part of the city.

west.description: The market place lies this way.

5233.name: The City Hall Foyer
5233.description: A grand foyer connects the eastern wing of the city hall to the private gardens. Polished marble floors reflect the light from ornate chandeliers.

west.description: The cobblestones lead to The City Hall

south.description: The Private Gardens And Courtyard Of Thalos

5200.name: beholder
5200.long_desc: You meet a beholder's deadly gaze!
5200.description:
It has a large central eye that projects an anti-magic ray and ten
eyestalks atop the round body which can do anything from charm you
to disintegrate you.  Beholders are not known for their personality.

phases.message: The beholder's eyestalks begin to glow!
The beholder floats higher, eyes blazing!

abilities.name: Disintegration Ray
abilities.telegraph: A central eye locks onto you with lethal focus!

abilities.name: Mind Spike
abilities.telegraph: Psychic energy ripples from the beholder!

5201.name: lamia
5201.long_desc: A strange lamia stands here waiting for her next meal.
5201.description:
This is a creature with the upper torso of a beautiful woman, but the lower
body of a four-legged beast.  She licks her lips as she looks at you greedily.

5202.name: mimic
5202.long_desc: A strong chest lies in one corner of the room.
5202.description:
A strong, wooden chest bound with iron straps and a heavy padlock on the
front.

5203.name: mimic
5203.long_desc: Two skeletons lie crushed under a large boulder.
5203.description:
This large boulder seems to have been dropped here at some point, since
there aren't any boulders native to this area.  The two skeletons beneath
it are simply that, bones... no rags or anything else appears to be
attached to them.

5204.name: mimic
5204.long_desc: The stone floor of this house has been ripped apart.
5204.description:
What a mess, you wonder to yourself what could have caused this rampant
destruction.

5205.name: mimic
5205.long_desc: Some broken shards of pottery lie strewn about the floor.
5205.description:
The pottery shards appear to have been part of a large vase at one point,
probably before the city fell.

5206.name: mimic
5206.long_desc: A few wooden planks lie stacked on a low shelf.
5206.description:
The fact that these planks still rest on this shelf leads you to believe
that someone has been here before you...

5208.name: golem
5208.long_desc: In the corner you see a large, stone golem faithfully standing watch.
5208.description:
It is a big chunk of rock that has been magically formed into a giant stone
creature.  He stands here still guarding the city.

5209.name: lamia
5209.long_desc: A strange lamia stands here waiting for her next meal.
5209.description:
This is a creature with the upper torso of a beautiful woman, but the lower
body of a four-legged beast.  She licks her lips as she looks at you greedily.

5298.name: street vendor
5298.long_desc: A street vendor stands here, hawking questionable wares from a rickety cart.
5298.description: He's missing two fingers on his left hand and has the shrewd eyes of someone who's cheated death — and customers — more times than he can count.

talk_responses.hello: The vendor grins wide. 'Finest goods in Thalos! Well, maybe not finest, but definitely cheapest. Say, you hear about the new tax the council pushed through? Bunch of crooks, the lot of them. At least I'm honest about my dishonesty!'
talk_responses.politics: He leans in conspiratorially. 'Word is the harbor master's been taking bribes from pirates. That's why the docks have been so dangerous lately.'
talk_responses.default: The vendor waves a hand. 'Browse all you like! Everything's negotiable, except my prices — those are final.'
talk_responses.next: The vendor glances around nervously. 'Between you and me, if you're looking for real adventure, the Drow City lies hidden beneath the earth — speak to Zilara the Shadow Exile if you dare. The deep mines of Moria also hold treasures beyond imagining... and horrors to match.'

5299.name: drunk sailor
5299.long_desc: A drunk sailor slumps against a barrel here, reeking of cheap rum.
5299.description: His weathered face tells tales of a thousand storms, and his bloodshot eyes struggle to focus on anything. A faded tattoo of a kraken adorns his forearm.

talk_responses.hello: The sailor belches loudly. 'I've shailed — sailed — every ocean there is, and I'll tell you this for free: there's things in the deep water that'd make a dragon weep. Saw a tentacle once, thick as a mast, just... reaching up from below.'
talk_responses.sea: He clutches his rum bottle. 'The eastern waters are the worst. Ships vanish there. No wreckage, no bodies. Just... gone. I won't sail east again, not for all the gold in Thalos.'
talk_responses.default: The sailor hiccups. 'Buy me a drink and I'll tell you about the time I outran a sea serpent... probably.'

5295.readable_text:
=== CITY OF THALOS ===
Recommended Level: 10-20
A bustling desert city with dangers in its streets
Seek Captain Varro for military contracts
West: Return toward Midgaard
